tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
quoteText:
Data We Collect and Process

i. . Contact data (such as email address or telephone number, if necessary)

ii. . Account registration or registration for on-line game participation (such as user name, password, miHoYo IDï¼‰

iii. . Information in miHoYo community forums, chats, or when you provide feedback or other user generated content (such as information that you post, comment or follow in any of our content or services. information sent through chat.
